title: Poster, "Take the wheel...You coul", 20th century
description: On blueprint grid paper, a design of a steering wheel, with blocks of text in white, center of wheel: Friday’s. Center left: Take the wheel. If you’ve got what it takes, / you could be on the road to a solidly success- / ful career at Friday’s. Because right now / we’re conducting a major in-house search for / outstanding employees who can work with / people, initiate ideas, set goals and see them / through. Upper right: Be a self starter. The skills you’ve / already developed at Friday’s—and your / understanding of the character and / scope of our operations—give you a head / start on moving forward to a wide range / of positions within our corporation. Lower right: Consider some of the routes / open to our employees who / have the drive. Some may be- / come an Assistant Department / Head or Department Head. Or / assist in training of managers. / Others will be chosen as part / of a special team to open a / new unit. Management calibre / candidates may become team / leaders, food and beverage / managers, or part of local, re- / gional or home office manage- / ment. In addition, there are / many other opportunities / open in areas ranging from / accounting to personnel. / So contact your General Manager / or the Training Department / in Dallas (214-233-2900) for details / on a Friday’s career that’ll take / you places.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "Take the wheel...You coul", 20th century.Screenprint on paper. 1991-69-62.
